label: 乳母
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: In principle, a woman who nursed a highborn infant in place of its mother, since such a mother did not normally nurse her child; although perhaps not all menoto nursed, since a child could have more than one.  A highborn child’s relationship with his or her nurse was lasting and intimate, and so was that with her own children.[乳母][also 傅][RK]
